snippet.title: Ps1: Destruction Derby Raw | Playstation 1 Game Trailer 2000
snippet.description:
Destruction Derby Raw is a video game for the PlayStation and is the third installment of the Destruction Derby series. It was developed by Studio 33 and was released in 2000. The game was released after Destruction Derby and Destruction Derby 2. Raw was added to the PlayStation Platinum Range on 15 February 2002.
Initial release date: 2000
Developer: Studio 33
Mode: Multiplayer video game
Genre: Racing Video Game
Platform: PlayStation
Publishers: Psygnosis, Sony Interactive Entertainment, Midway Games, ak tronic Software & Services GmbH
Series: Destruction Derby
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                            From the Archives
                                  For the memories and the fans
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
From Playstation 1. This is an original capture from an official demo disc. Rendered in 4K. 
I hope you enjoyed this look back in time and gaming history. Do you remember this? Share your thoughts in the comments.
There are plenty more in my Playlists below, and lots more other vids on my channel, if you like you can subscribe for more to come here https://www.youtube.com/@Robbinozz88?sub_confirmation=1 
 I get more done with coffee. If You'd like to shout me one click here: https://buymeacoffee.com/robbinozz much appreciated, thanks.

This video is part of my 'From the Archives' retro series of game trailers, promo's, demo's, playable demo's and lots more being added from the 80's to now that can be seen here: 
Playstation 1: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0C5taz8xAJStjFQRn81-6r4hzb0GpQ42 Playstation 2: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0C5taz8xAJQQr0c-CbObSHsxlRR-L2iL
Playstation 3: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0C5taz8xAJTc44SUKBqnZqUZoOdJgBx8. All are recorded from original consoles, game discs, and media. Original video and audio used wherever possible. Thanks for watching
